description:
Greedent is a Normal-type Pokémon introduced in Generation VIII.
It evolves from Skwovet starting at level 24.
Greedent is a bipedal squirrel-like Pokémon with a tan and brown plump body, a buck tooth, black eyes, yellow nose, stumpy limbs and a huge tail larger than its body. The front of its body and its cheeks are darker brown than the rest of its body.
True to their name, Greedent are extremely greedy and gluttonous. Greedent stuff their tails with so many berries, that these berries fall out constantly, especially when it is hit or faints. Dimwitted, Greedent will not often notice the loss of their food they store. Its sharp teeth are strong enough to gnaw through the strongest of berry shells.
Greedent and its pre-evolution are the only known Pokémon capable of using the the move Stuff Cheeks.
name: Yokubarisu
